detectors.description:
ArtemisFinance.onlyActive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#76-81) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-! activeStatus (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#77)

ArtemisFinance.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#189-191) logic is abnormal, abnormal termination statement:
	- revert()() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#190)
detectors.markdown:
[ArtemisFinance.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#L189-L191) logic is abnormal, abnormal termination statement:
	- [revert()()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#L190)

detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ArtemisFinance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#34-193) has payable functions:
	 - ArtemisFinance.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#189-191)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ArtemisFinance.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#93-95)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#23)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#24)
	- ArtemisFinance.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#97-99)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#25)
	- ArtemisFinance.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#101-103)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#26)
	- ArtemisFinance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#105-119)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#27)
	- ArtemisFinance.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#121-128)

activeMode() should be declared external:
	- ArtemisFinance.activeMode() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#83-86)

resetMode() should be declared external:
	- ArtemisFinance.resetMode() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#88-91)

burn(uint256) should be declared external:
	- ArtemisFinance.burn(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#150-161)

freeze(uint256) should be declared external:
	- ArtemisFinance.freeze(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#163-174)

unfreeze(uint256) should be declared external:
